installPrompt.title: This app can be installed for offline use
installPrompt.instructionsChrome: If you are using Chrome, press the Menu button in the browser and Add to homescreen.
installPrompt.instructionsSafari: If you are using Safari, press the Share button in the browser and Add to Home Screen.
installPrompt.instructionsOpera: If you are using Opera, press the plus sign in top left and Add to home screen.
installPrompt.instructionsOther: For any other browser please consult with documentation.

prompt.text: Hey Aideen,  If you ever want to chat about Health insurance options we’re here to help

step1.title: Account provider
step1.subtitle: Which provider would you like to add an account from?

notFound.title: Can’t find your account provider?
notFound.text: Not all banks are on Open Banking yet. Expect to see more soon.

step2.title: Open Banking
step2.subtitle: Connect your Open Banking account
step2.text1: We will now connect you to Banco Santander to select accounts you want to view in Polaris app.
step2.text2: You will be be able to view your account summary and transaction details.
step2.agreement1: I have read and accept the Terms & Conditions of Open Banking.
step2.agreement2: Further conditions that need to be agreed.

step1.title: Message from {{name}}
step1.agreement1: In order for us to offer this service, we need your approval to access the following information from the accounts you hold at your bank or building society.

step3.title: Open Banking
step3.subtitle: Connect your Open Banking account
step3.message1: We will now connect you to {{provider}} to select accounts you want to share with {{name}} in Polaris.
step3.message2: You will share your account summary and transaction details.
step3.agreement1: I have read and accept the Terms & Conditions of Open Banking.
step3.agreement2: Further conditions that need to be agreed.
step3.agreement3: We will access your information from your account until {{date, EEEE do MMMM yyyy}}.

action.title: Action notification
action.body: {{name}}'s account dropped below {{threshold}} {{currency}}. Confirm top up transfer.
